snippet.title: Realforce 87U Review + Sound Test (C R E A M Y)
snippet.description:
New course coming soon! Learn Java Fast launches on July 1st, 2020. Stay informed and join the waitlist: https://course.alexlorenlee.com/courses/learn-java-fast

- Realforce 87u - https://amzn.to/37OHP7v
Realforce R2 - https://amzn.to/2SR1PBW
Happy Hacking Keyboard Pro 2 - https://amzn.to/38XBTu8
Happy Hacking Keyboard Pro 2 Type S - https://amzn.to/2VhFuPQ

Any of these keyboards from PFU will result in the most satisfying keyboard experience you will probably ever have. The Realforce 87u is an older model, so the Realforce R2 will be more available and yield similar results. (I could not find the black Realforce 87u that I have in this video, so I linked the white one)

The Realforce 87u 55g is one of the most satisfying keyboards on the planet. Mechanical keyboard threads almost completely agree that the topmost satisfying keyboard switches are topre 55g, holy pandas, and other rare/expensive switches.

The Realforce 87u (or any realforce keyboard or hhkb) will be an extremely satisfying experience for you. It really is amazing. To get this amazing, creamy sound out of this keyboard, you will need to learn how to "lube" your keyboard and stabilizers.

Here are some great videos where you can learn how to lube your keyboard to get the most satisfying keyboard sound from you realforce 87u.

Lubing tutorial - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PXgFOME0khw
Lube (Krytox 205g0) - https://amzn.to/2uoobRX

This is by far the most satisfying keyboard I have ever used.

Do I recommened this satisfying keyboard for everyone?

Absolutely not. It's expensive.

But like I said if you want these small, satisfying moments spread throughout your day and you use a keyboard a lot, it might just be worth it :) -

Free tips and programs: http://alexlorenlee.com

Recommended Channels to Subscribe to
Career Karma: https://youtube.com/channel/UCkCwv67-HTCzIhxLG8aHOQQ
TheNewBoston: https://youtube.com/user/thenewboston

~
https://discord.com/invite/Yk3uqST
https://instagram.com/alexlorenlee
https://youtube.com/channel/UCLkeDGcXfiKlN2imazwkg4A (2nd channel)

Alex Lee
